Class OutBuffer

java.lang.Object
  org.instaware.network.nexus.Buffer
      org.instaware.network.nexus.OutBuffer

public class OutBuffer
extends Buffer

Writes data towards a network input stream.

Thomas Nappo

OutBuffer

public OutBuffer(int opCode,
                 byte[] payload,
                 boolean bare,
                 Buffer.Type type)
Constructs a new OutBuffer.

Parameters:
opCode - The operation code of the data buffer.
payload - Control information data which is contained.
bare - Whether or not this buffer contains the standard header.
type - The type-size of the OutBuffer.

Method Detail

setBare

public OutBuffer setBare(boolean bare)
Sets this buffer as bare. A bare buffer will contain only the payload data, rather than having the standard buffer header prepended.

Parameters:
bare - Whether this buffer is to be sent bare

setOpCode

public OutBuffer setOpCode(int opCode)
Sets the ID for this buffer.

Parameters:
id - The ID of the buffer

setSize

public OutBuffer setSize(Buffer.Type type)
Sets the size of the buffer builder.

Parameters:
s - The new size.

addBytes

public OutBuffer addBytes(byte[] data)
Adds the contents of byte array data to the buffer. The size of this buffer will grow by the length of the provided array.

Parameters:
data - The bytes to add to this buffer
Returns:
A reference to this object

addBytes

public OutBuffer addBytes(byte[] data,
                          int offset,
                          int len)
Adds the contents of byte array data, starting at index offset. The size of this buffer will grow by len bytes.

Parameters:
data - The bytes to add to this buffer
offset - The index of the first byte to append
len - The number of bytes to append
Returns:
A reference to this object
